reviews.review_msg: The assignments were graded without any criteria and without much explanation in class or on canvas. If a university professor or an authoritative scholar in linguistics fails to meet the care and compassion of a student, it is better to retake the education course. A bit of the basic qualities and standards of teachers are not there.

Professor Hilgendorf was amazing. Admittedly, this course (Sociolinguistics)  is her specialty, so I expected nothing short of spectacular which she delivered. This class was writing intensive and her expectations were very clear and she took alot of time to help us meet that expectation. Amazing lecturer. Willing and available for help.
